oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Carl W. Reuss correspondence with Raymond B. Witt, 1961 March 9
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Reuss, Carl W., 1904-1995; United States. Court of Appeals (6th Circuit)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter from Carl W. Reuss, clerk of the United States Court of Appeals, to Raymond B. Witt, attorney for the defendants in Mapp v. Board of Education, confirming that the motion to appeal submitted 1960 December 30.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Mapp v. Board of Education of Chattanooga; Segregation in education -- Law and legislation; Segregation in education -- Tennessee -- Chattanooga
